sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.WFSPMCMSDemandAjaxUtils</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>true</client_callable>
        <description>This scriptInclude is used for all ajax related scripts.</description>
        <name>WFSPMCMSDemandAjaxUtils</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var WFSPMCMSDemandAjaxUtils = Class.create();
WFSPMCMSDemandAjaxUtils.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {


    /*
    @name  hasEditAccessToAsmtResult
    @ return true if user has access to Assessment Result Table else returns false
    */
    hasEditAccessToAsmtResult: function() {
        var asrGR = new GlideRecord("u_assessment_results");
        if (asrGR.get(this.getParameter('sysparm_asrId'))) {
            if (gs.nil(asrGR.getValue('u_parent'))) {
                var dmnGR = new GlideRecord('dmn_demand');
                if (dmnGR.get(this.getParameter('sysparm_dmnId'))) {

                    if (gs.getUserID() === dmnGR.getValue('demand_manager')) {
                        return true;
                    }
                    var dmnTask = new GlideRecord('dmn_demand_task');
                    dmnTask.addActiveQuery();
                    dmnTask.addEncodedQuery('stateIN-5,1,2');
                    dmnTask.addQuery('parent', this.getParameter('sysparm_dmnId'));
                    dmnTask.addQuery('correlation_display', 'CMS - Re-Ideation Assessment Result');
                    dmnTask.query();
                    if (dmnTask.next()) {

                        if (gs.getUser().isMemberOf(dmnTask.getDisplayValue('assignment_group'))) {
							
                            return "review";
                        }

                    }
                }
            }
        }

        return false;

    },






});]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>K098414</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2023-11-20 19:14:28</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>aa021f3e87ae3d10b00263130cbb3576</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>35</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>WFSPMCMSDemandAjaxUtils</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_aa021f3e87ae3d10b00263130cbb3576</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2024-02-04 17:26:29</sys_updated_on>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
